issue.title: Add memcopy_threads to serialization context
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1951](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1951). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, when calling `put` with a plasma client, we set `memcopy_threads` to 4. We should expose this so it can be changed through Python.
